description: Verify a list of tags on a given instance

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Optional) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.

InstanceId.description: (Required) The ID of the instance whose tags will be verified.

TagsToVerify.description: (Required) The list of tags in the form of tagname1=value,tagname2,tagname3=value.
